plugin.title: Related
plugin.author: LongTail Video
plugin.description: This plugin displays a menu with related videos.

flashvar.name: file
flashvar.description: URL link to an mRSS playlist containing related video metadata. If not set or empty, the "related videos" screen will display "No related videos found"

flashvar.name: oncomplete
flashvar.description: Show the related videos screen when the video completes.

flashvar.name: usedock
flashvar.description: If false, the dock button for popping the related videos will not be shown.
